name: places/ChIJTbuUip7CrIkRDXtdSCzOkv8
formattedAddress: 330 E 46th St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 330 E 46th St, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
For years I have known that I wanted by wedding photos captured by Julian and not only were my expectations met, I was absolutely blown away. Absolutely everything from the pre-wedding meeting (where he provided reassurance and a calming presence I didn't even know I needed!) to the delivery of the photos was absolutely perfect. I don't know how he does it but every single photo was stunning and looking through them was like being there all over again. On the day of the wedding he made taking photos fun and exciting and at the same time had a calm, reassuring and extremely professional attitude. I could not recommend him more as a wedding photographer.

Edit: we received our wedding photo album and it is absolutely stunning in every way. The quality of the album, the ease of the system Julian uses to select the photos was perfect and I am delighted to have this beautiful keepsake to look back it for year to come.

originalText.text:
We recently had the pleasure of working with Julian for our engagement shoot, and we couldn't be happier with the experience and the stunning photos we received. Although our wedding is still six months away, based on our engagement shoot, we have complete confidence in Julian's ability to capture our special day beautifully, especially the emotional and candid moments that are most important to us.

From my first interaction with Julian, his professionalism and passion for photography shone through. He took the time to understand us as a couple, our vision, and our preferences. I felt immediately at ease and confident speaking with him and knew that he, and Evgenia, were the best choice for our wedding day.

It was extremely important to us to find a photographer who is calm, organized, professional, friendly, passionate, and reliable. Julian has encapsulated each of those adjectives in every interaction that we have had with him - from emails to phone calls, to an introductory Zoom meeting, and in-person during our engagement shoot.

With all the wedding planning in motion, having Julian taking care of our photography needs is an incredible relief. We can confidently say that there's absolutely nothing to worry about when it comes to capturing the most cherished moments of our big day. It's an indescribable feeling of reassurance and excitement—we cannot wait for our wedding day to arrive!

originalText.text:
I had the pleasure of working with Julian and his staff a few weeks ago. He and his staff are not only such a talent but the were super friendly and easy going. As a creative person it is so important for all the vendors to work collectively with each other to get the best results and I have to say they are one of the best.
Most importantly, after seeing the amazing photos they produced you can see the level of skill and passion put into his work. I highly recommend Julian and his staff and cannot wait to work together again!

originalText.text:
Our experience was AMAZING. Julian was extremely communicative before the wedding, answering all of our questions, and providing information we did not even know we needed.

On the day of the wedding, Julian and his partner were extremely friendly and professionals. At times they were busy taking photos in the background.  when it came time for pictures with the entire wedding party, they were really efficient and organized. The photos themselves were ahead of schedule and incredible. We are sharing Julian‘s contact information with friends who will be getting married in the future.

originalText.text: I had initially reached out to Julian after seeing what an amazing job he and Evgenia had done at my sister in laws wedding back in 2018. Every single picture they took told a story and evoked an emotional response looking back on their wedding day. I knew after seeing their photos that I wanted to work with them some day, and thankfully that opportunity came a few years later. Julian & Evgenia were an absolute dream to work with- they were extremely professional, flexible, kind, and time efficient. We made the most of our wedding day and the best part was that they documented everything without us even realizing it. Our engagement shoot and wedding day were virtually stress free because we were able to let the professionals do what they do best- use their talents and artistic style to capture our day as a story unfolding. My husband and I confessed to Julian that we were a bit camera shy during our first shoot, and Julian showed us empathy and helped us feel completely relaxed and directed us when we felt nervous. Grateful that I got to work with Julian & Evgenia both separate and together because they are such a lovely couple and I love witnessing how supportive they are of each other. I’m so grateful they were able to work with us and we will forever cherish our photo memories from our best day ever!
